sqlQuery.name: Properties
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, compound_id, property, CASE WHEN type IS NULL THEN '' ELSE type END AS type, CASE WHEN property ='Molecular Formula' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(value,'(\d)','<sub>\1</sub>') ELSE value END AS value FROM apidb.PubChemCompound ORDER BY property

sqlQuery.name: SubstanceProps
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, s1.value as compound_id, s2.property, CASE WHEN (s2.property='KEGG') THEN '' || s2.value || '' ELSE s2.value END AS value FROM APIDB.pubchemsubstance s1, APIDB.pubchemsubstance s2 WHERE s1.property = 'CID' AND s1.substance_id = s2.substance_id AND NOT s2.property = 'CID'
